prompts: Create a majestic deer-like Pokemon with antlers that change colors with the seasons.
I want a nature-themed Pokemon that embodies the essence of spring and summer.
Generate a Pokemon that has a strong connection to the forest and thrives in grassy areas.
Make a Pokemon that is agile and swift, perfect for evading predators in the wild.
Imagine a Pokemon with a warm, friendly demeanor that enjoys roaming in meadows.
Design a creature that can adapt its fur color to match different environments.
Show me a Pokemon whose appearance changes dramatically based on the time of year.
